<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a vector stack variable, like: int4 stack&#91;2&#93;, the data will be stored</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the following ways depending on the StackWidth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
